main.title: From Concept to Live Server
main.description: Full-cycle web development for founders. I transform ideas into production-ready, scalable websites and tools, handling every step from UI/UX to deployment.

card1.title: Frontend development
card1.description: Building user interfaces with React, focusing on performance, clean code, and scalability

card2.title: Websites Turnkey
card2.description: Landing pages, business websites, and portfolios with responsive layouts and basic SEO optimization

card3.title: Integrations
card3.description: Integration of APIs, contact forms, analytics, and multilingual support

card4.title: Maintenance & Support
card4.description: Bug fixing, ongoing project improvements, and code refactoring support
